Steinberg::Vst::PolyPressureEvent

PolyPressureEvent Struct Reference

PolyPressure event specific data. More...

#include <ivstevents.h>

Data Fields

int16 channel
 channel index in event bus
int16 pitch
 range [0, 127] = [C-2, G8] with A3=440Hz

 range [0.0, 1.0]
